mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports ( reporter_id, target_type, target_id, report_reason_code, report_detail, status_code, created_at ) VALUES ( #{reporterId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{reportReasonCode}, #{reportDetail}, #{statusCode}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET status_code = #{statusCode}, processed_at = NOW(), processed_by = #{processorId} WHERE id = #{reportId} AND status_code = 'RPT001'
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS reportId, m.username AS reporterName, p.title AS reportedPostTitle, r.target_id AS reportedPostId, r.report_reason_code AS reasonCode, DATE_FORMAT(r.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS reportedAt, r.status_code AS statusCode FROM reports r LEFT JOIN members m ON r.reporter_id = m.id LEFT JOIN posts p ON r.target_id = p.id AND r.target_type = 'POST' WHERE r.target_type = 'POST' ORDER BY FIELD(r.status_code, 'RPT001') DESC, r.created_at DESC
